name: mikroe.click.pressure16
short_description: Pressure 16 Click is a compact add-on board that contains a board-mount pressure sensor. This board features the WSEN-PADS (2511020213301), a high-precision MEMS-based digital absolute pressure sensor from WÃ¼rth Elektronik. It has a fully-calibrated 24-bit pressure output to provide accurate atmospheric pressure data with a configurable host interface that supports both I2C and SPI serial communication and with an intelligent on-chip motion-triggered interrupt feature.
